nodes.agent_prompt: Combine the flight data collected from the RetrieverAgent calls (T001, T002, T003). Remove any duplicate flight entries. Sort the flights by price in ascending order and present the most affordable options first. Also, filter out any flights with more than 2 layovers.

nodes.description: Format the final output into a user-friendly HTML table displaying comprehensive flight options.
nodes.agent_prompt: Take the refined flight options from T004 and format them into a user-friendly HTML table. The table should include columns for Airline, Flight Number, Departure Time, Arrival Time, Layover Information, and Price. Ensure the table is well-structured and visually appealing.
